summary: This mod allows you to use the most amazing weapon in the game, the Bow of Ember
descriptionHtml:
Once there was a ruler called Ember. He was a fierce warrior, and had many weapons produced for his use on the battlefield. All of these weapons have been found and scattered across Skyrim. Except one. His bow was never found, and is said to accompany him in his grave by what is now Riverwood.

Check out the video!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mWdu0S4p3ms&feature=youtu.be
author: Pandaman024
